SELECT B_NUM, B_TYPE, B_TITLE, B_VIEWS, B_CREARE_DATE, B_MODIFY_DATE, B_STATUS, B_PIN, B.M_ID M_ID, M_NAME, JOB_NAME, COUNT(DECODE(REPLY_STATUS, 0, 1)) REPLY_COUNT FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN REPLY USING(B_NUM) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.M_ID = M.M_ID) LEFT JOIN JOB USING(JOB_ID) WHERE B_TYPE = '공지' AND B_STATUS = 0 GROUP BY B_NUM, B_TYPE, B_TITLE, B_VIEWS, B_CREARE_DATE, B_MODIFY_DATE, B_STATUS, B_PIN, B.M_ID, M_NAME, JOB_NAME ORDER BY B_PIN DESC, B_NUM DESC
